entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
